eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Gila, AZ; Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; at 08:36 PM ON DEC 26, 2025 Effective until 04:36 AM DEC 27, 2025. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A SAFE Alert has been issued for Maricopa County. Gilbert Police Department is looking for 74 year old Melody Ann La Gue.  Melody is a white female, 5 feet 3 inches tall, 120 pounds, with blonde hair and brown eyes.  Melody was last seen at 1400 hours on 12/26/25 on foot near the 1100 block of East Baseline Road in Gilbert, Arizona.  She was last seen wearing a blue sweatshirt, blue jeans and with a pink purse.  Melody suffers from a condition which can cause her to become confused and disoriented.  If you have seen Melody, please contact the Gilbert Police Department at 480-503-6500 or call 911. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
